name: SpellingGameforKidsbyMagoosh
0:
”Alexa, play Spell the Word”
”Alexa, launch Spell the Word”
”Alexa, start Spell the Word”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spell the word
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Magoosh Spelling Game is a fun, turn-based spelling game, where you can learn definitions and practice spelling 200+ words at the fifth-grade level. It's created by Magoosh test prep, an online company dedicated to providing students with fun and helpful educational materials.

Just ask, "Alexa, play Spell the Word ", and she'll ask if you want to start the game. She'll give you a word and you will then spell the word together, alternating letters. For example, she might say something like this:

"The word is momentum. It means 'the force from moving'. The first letter is 'm'. What is the next letter?"

You would then respond with 'o', and she would continue with 'm', and you would continue with 'e', and so on. Don't worry if you get a letter wrong! She'll ask you to repeat your answer in case she misheard you. If you get it wrong 3 times, Alexa will give you the correct letter and ask if you want to either start the word over or move on to a new word. That's it! Have fun!

Please leave any feedback in a review, constructive or positive, and we'll do our best to make this skill better for you! You can also find us in the iTunes and Android app stores, and you can tweet the developer @albwhoo or tweet the whole team @magoosh.
priv:
